Text: The first track is cut of abruptly, its supposed to be around 9:48 minutes but is only 6:05 here... thats a shame on such a great album/upload otherwise...

Album was great.  Been looking for the original album for quite some time.  But you should let people know that there have been 3 extra tracks added that weren't on the original album.

Bolero
Bat Out of Hell (Live)
Dead Ringer
